name: Linkwarden
description: Self-hosted collaborative bookmark manager to collect, read, annotate, and preserve webpages.

NEXTAUTH_SECRET.description: A random 32+ character string for session security. You can generate one at: https://www.lastpass.com/features/password-generator

MEILI_HOST.description: REQUIRED: Sign up for a free Meilisearch Cloud project and paste the 'URL' here.

MEILI_MASTER_KEY.description: REQUIRED: From your Meilisearch Cloud project, paste the 'Default Admin API Key' here.

scripts.postdeploy: heroku config:set NEXT_PUBLIC_HOST_URL=https://$(heroku apps:info -j | jq -r .app.name).herokuapp.com NEXTAUTH_URL=https://$(heroku apps:info -j | jq -r .app.name).herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth
